theGamblignant:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theGamblignant:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theGamblignant:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theGamblignant:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theGamblignant:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theGamblignant:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theGamblignant:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theGamblignant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theGamblignant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theGamblignant:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theGamblignant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theGamblignant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theGamblignant:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theGamblignant:Gank.NAME: Gank
theGamblignant:Gank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and add !M! to your next roll.
